infoPlist.NSUserNotificationUsageDescription: Allow ExplorAble to send you notifications about friend requests, comments, and activity updates.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: explorAble needs access to your location to track your activities and save your favorite spots.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: explorAble needs access to your location to track your activities in the background.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: explorAble needs access to your camera to take photos of your adventure spots.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: explorAble needs access to your photo library to add photos to your saved locations.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: explorAble needs permission to save photos to your photo library.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow ExplorAble to track your activities in the background for accurate route recording.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow explorAble to access your camera to capture your adventure moments.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow explorAble to access your microphone for video recording.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow explorAble to access your photos to add to your saved spots.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow explorAble to save photos to your gallery.
